question:
Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh Governments signed a Memorandum of undertaking for the linking of two rivers as a link project.
Which are these two rivers?
explanation: Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh Governments signed a memorandum of understanding for the linking of river Betwa and Ken. Both Ken and Betwa are the triburaties of Yamuna. According to the proposal 1020 million cubic metres of will be diverted from Ken Basin in a link canal that will be 231 km long. The canals will tranverse both states to provide irrigation and drinking water.
